title: 3 and Out - Indefinitely Suspend Watson, New NFL Media, Kupp + Donald Funny $$
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Indefinitely Suspend Watson, New NFL Media, Kupp + Donald Funny $$
description:
John discusses the drastically changing landscape of NFL media coverage, how the Rams are able to extend Cooper Kupp and Aaron Donald, and why the NFL should suspend Deshaun Watson Indefinitely. He explains why Baker Mayfield should be more self-aware, what Belichick copycat move Josh McDaniels unnecessarily made in minicamp, why Lamar Jackson can’t take a rep until he gets paid, and why Nick Bosa should play out this year.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates. Go to  FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
